content: this simple side-to-side crochet pattern creates an easy triangle shawl that gives you a variety of options for playing with color the sample combined a solid color with a colorshifting yarn to offer a gradual movement of color across the entire work you could combine two solid colors for a tonal look use up scraps paired with a single skein of a solid color or just play with bits and pieces to create something brand new to change size use bigger or small yarn and a matching hook alternatively do more increase row which will be matched with more decrease row
